value: 735 Western Port Hwy Cnr Hall Rd, Skye, 3977, VIC, Australia

5193 - Flowers, Nursery Stock and Florists' Supplies Summary > BALL AUSTRALIA PTY LTD (formerly COLEGRAVE SEEDS PTY. LTD.) is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover farm-product raw materials, not elsewhere classified. The company is involved in the import but not export of goods. BALL AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Skye, Victoria. It is headed by managing director Simon Nicholas Gomme. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $30.25 million. Its net loss totalled $784,000. BALL AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the wholesale trade industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
